data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
Editing in Quantum of Solace drives me insane. Blink and you miss beautiful and I mean BEAUTIFUL shots.

Scenes getting intercut with random shots and angles, average length of 0.9 seconds, climbing one step THREE cuts, everything moving with shaky cam have no idea what’s going on in any of action scenes.

that opening chase deserved better.

the warehouse/rope fight deserved better.

that opera scene especially deserved better.

Funny enough it’s the shortest Bond film. Imagine that

Has a movie ever been ruined for you by the editing? Madam Web is a recent one with some odd ass editing
